segments.text: Excuse me , doc . I am not feeling well . Can you help me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but not here . Have you got registered yet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I haven't . Where do I go for that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The registration office . Did you bring your records with you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is anybody here with you ? Parents or siblings ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I'm here all by myself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are a brave kid . Go ahead to the registration office first , then to the doctors .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I don't know where the registration office is .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's in the hall on the first floor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do I have to come back here after getting registered ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , kid . This is the gynecology department .
segments.speaker: S2
